events.title: DSC S25 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Spring 2025 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: Career Workshop
events.description: Get tips on resume building, interview preparation, and navigating the data science job market.

events.title: Data Cleaning Workshop
events.description: Learn how to clean and prepare data for analysis using Python and Pandas.

events.title: Breaking into ML Research - Maxwell Jones
events.description: Learn about how to break into machine learning research and what it takes to succeed in the field from Maxwell Jones, a CMU PhD student.
